CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 4, 1941, page 2, reads: "Mr. and Mrs. Ashley Hughes of 2525 Chauncey Drive, entertained numerous friends from Michigan over the Fourth, as may be seen above. From left to right they are Mrs. Somerset Hughes of Battle Creek, Mich., Mr. and Mrs. Alfred Burch of Albion, Mich., Samuel Hughes and Mrs. Edward Pearson. - (Harris Photo)."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait from left: Mrs. Somerset Hughes, Alfred Burch, Mrs. Alfred Burch, Samuel Hughes, and Mrs. Edward Pearson standing on sidewalk at Terrace Village Public Housing Development
